sentences: Ma kolisin oma uude korterisse eelmisel nädalal.
See on väga suur ja hea kvaliteediga korter.
Korteris on kahe magamistoa ja üks vannituba.
context: The Estonian word 'korter' means apartment or flat in English. It refers to a self-contained housing unit within a larger building that is rented or owned by individuals or families. The word is commonly used when referring to living quarters in multi-story buildings, as opposed to single-family homes.
